body.p: This document is an ongoing work in progress. It contains gaps, inaccuracies, omissions, typos and the occasional outright lie. The intent is to make an handbook giving developers and users correct, detailed, up to date technical content.
Contributions are encouraged. See the section for how to get started.
If you have any corrections, suggestions or improvements please contact the editors. Large portions of the handbook were originally written by Ciaran McCreesh along with our contributors.
